'''Koami''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A young woman leans against the till, her eyes half-closed. She jerks awake when she hears the scuff of your boots on the flagstones and fumbles about for something to polish in an effort to look busy.}}

Koami works for the RDC by accident, as she followed her ex-boyfriend into service after he skipped out on her in the middle of the night. While he eventually left, she stayed and wound up on Sayuka as a weapon master.
